Global.Alt + D: Select the URL in the address bar to edit
Global.Alt + E: Open the Settings and more  menu
Global.Alt + F: Open the Settings and more  menu
Global.Alt + Home: Open your home page in the current tab
Global.Alt + Shift + B: Set focus on the first item in the favorites bar
Global.Alt + Shift + T: Set focus on the first item in the app bar toolbar
Global.Alt: Set focus on the Settings and more  button
Global.Ctrl + D: Save the current tab as a favorite
Global.Ctrl + E: Open a search query in the address bar
Global.Ctrl + Enter: Add www. to the beginning and .com to the end of text typed in the address bar
Global.Ctrl + F6: Move focus to the web content pane
Global.Ctrl + G: Jump to the next result for find on page
Global.Ctrl + K: Open a search query in the address bar
Global.Ctrl + L: Select the URL in the address bar to edit
Global.Ctrl + O: Open a file from your computer in Edge
Global.Ctrl + Shift + B: Show or hide the favorites bar
Global.Ctrl + Shift + D: Save all open tabs as favorites in a new folder
Global.Ctrl + Shift + G: Jump to the previous result for find on page
Global.Ctrl + Shift + L: Paste and search or Paste and go (if it's a URL)
Global.Ctrl + Shift + M: Sign in as a different user or browse as a Guest
Global.Ctrl + Shift + R: Reload the current page, ignoring cached content
Global.Ctrl + Shift + T: Reopen the last closed tab, and switch to it
Global.Ctrl + T: Open a new tab and switch to it
Global.Ctrl + \\ (in a PDF): Toggle PDF between fit to page / fit to width
Global.End: Go to the bottom of the page, Move keyboard focus to last item of pane
Global.Esc: Stop loading page; close dialog or pop-up
Global.F10: Set focus on the Settings and more  button
Global.F4: Select the URL in the address bar
Global.F7: Turn caret browsing on or off
Global.Home: Go to the top of the page, Move keyboard focus to first item of pane
Global.PgDn: Scroll down webpage, one screen at a time
Global.PgUp: Scroll up webpage, one screen at a time
Global.Shift + F5: Reload the current tab, ignoring cached content
Global.Shift + Spacebar: Scroll up webpage, one screen at a time
Global.Spacebar: Scroll down webpage, one screen at a time
